attributes.action: get apple to create an operating system that works on PC's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Apple states that there Macintosh Operating system will not operate on PC's and can only run on their own computer systems and yet they complain at Microsoft for having a monopoly. There are alot of Microsoft customers whom would happily change to Apples operating system if they could install it on their own PC erasing MS Windows

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
